root.name: Hardcore Pinball
root.description: OverviewHardcore Pinball is a pinball game developed by Paragon Five and published by Telegames for the Game Boy Advance platform.GameplayHardcore Pinball is a pretty typical pinball game in which the player has three balls in order to try and get the highest score possible.TablesThe game contains four different themed pinball tables, each with their own high score tables.StationRobomechSoccerRetro
